resources.string: Allows system apps to access the checkin provider.
Allows application to access DRM-protected content.
Allows an application to retrieve internal state information from the camera service.
Allows the app to read Android Beam data from another app
Allows end point apps signed with the Motorola signature to register with the sync engine of smart notifications
Allows definition of the volume panel and hardware key behaviour
permission to access the checkin provider
Allow app to access radio diagnostic data.
